participant_1.background:
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I'm small, but I stand out in a crowd because I love wearing leather.
Football is my main focus, and I need to look my best to be successful.
my boyfriend is unemployed.
i like doing art projects.

participant_2.background:
I'm not worried about what others think of my appearance as long as I feel comfortable in my own skin.
I'm interested in learning more about how to grow organic food at home, so I can save money and have more control over what my family eats.
My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet.
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i am an old woman who lives on a social security check.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I just got home from taking my dog for a walk.
Oh, that's nice! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's a great dog!
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and cute.
They are! They're also really smart and easy to train.
That's great! Do you have any other pets?
No, just Buddy. I'm not really a cat person.
I'm not a big fan of cats either. They're too independent for me.
Yeah, they can be aloof.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, garden, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a nice life. I like to do art projects, play with my parrot, and watch football.
Art projects sound fun! I've never been very artistic, but I admire people who are.
It's not too hard to get started! There are a lot of great resources online.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
I'm sure you'd be good at it.
Thanks! I hope so!
